item.title: Starter automatically on login in the inventory help?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

So the problem is, when you login to the server yes a starter is automatically in your inventory. Heres the dumb thing -_-. When you login again another starter is in your inventory, and so on, say for example I get full iron starter, and I equip all of it. I re-log and will see another full iron starter in my inventory. I really want to fix this and heres my code, tell me if theres a blocker or something I can add so starter does not do that.

} // First newbie weapon/shield bakatool playerItems[0] = 996; playerItemsN[0] = 100000; playerItems[1] = 1116; playerItemsN[1] = 1; playerItems[2] = 1324; playerItemsN[2] = 1; playerItems[3] = 1068; playerItemsN[3] = 1;

Read full topic
item.source: Starter automatically on login in the inventory help?
